article_title: Missouri Gov. Jay Nixon's Political Ambitions Tested
article_text:
Just as Democratic Gov. Jay Nixon of Missouri was angling for attention as a potential national political leader, the turmoil in Ferguson has abruptly catapulted him from obscurity into a national spotlight of a more problematic sort.

Mr. Nixon, who recently hinted of aspirations beyond Missouri with trips to Iowa and other dog whistles of ambition, has been criticized for moving too slowly and ineffectively to manage the crisis...
